glosses: to fear, be afraid of, dread, wince

etymology: From Ottoman Turkish اوركمك (ürkmek), from Proto-Turkic *ürk- (“to be afraid”). Cognate with Old Turkic [script needed] (ürk-, “to be afraid, run away in fear”), Kyrgyz үркүү (ürküü, “to be frightened of”), Uzbek hurkmoq, Kazakh үрку (ürku, “to be frightened of”).
